9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"The Prophet left me while he had a joyous look of contentment and he returned to me grieving. So I asked him about that and he said: 'I entered the Ka'bah, and I wished that I had not done it. I fear that my Ummah will follow me (in that) after me

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي دُخُولِ الْكَعْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Entering The Ka'bah
